00032 int APIENTRY _tWinMain(HINSTANCE hInstance,
00033                      HINSTANCE hPrevInstance,
00034                      LPTSTR    lpCmdLine,
00035                      int       nCmdShow)
00036 {
00037   try {
00038         System::Threading::Thread::CurrentThread->ApartmentState = System::Threading::ApartmentState::STA;
00039 
00040         const std::string version ("NON-OFFICIAL-RELEASE");
00041         const std::string cvsId ("$Id: apt-midas-win.cpp,v 1.9 2009-09-25 17:49:05 mspald Exp $");
00042         const std::string execVersion = version + " " + cvsId;
00043 
00044         Application::Run(new WinMidas( execVersion ));
00045         return 0;
00046   } 
00047   catch(...) {
00048       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00049       return 1;
00050   }
00051   return 1;
00052 }
